sense.gloss: to be complete, to be all present, to make a full set, to be satisfied (of conditions)
to be equal, to be uniform, to be even, to match, to agree
to gather, to assemble, to be collected

sdata.j: ↑入札↑↓にゅうさつ↓が↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑出↑↓で↓|そろう|まで、↑決定↑↓けってい↓を↑保留↑↓ほりゅう↓してはどうでしょう。
sdata.e: I suggest that we hold off on making a decision until all bids are in.

sdata.j: ↑夕食↑↓ゆうしょく↓には↑家族↑↓かぞく↓↑全員↑↓ぜんいん↓が|そろう|。
sdata.e: All the family meet at evening meals.
